title: Report: Tour de France Mastermind Rod Ellingworth Quits Ineos Grenadiers
content:
Deputy principal leaves Ineos Grenadiers in midst of exodus of top climbers, top boss Brailsford's future also in doubt.

Read the full article at Report: Tour de France Mastermind Rod Ellingworth Quits Ineos Grenadiers on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
